collectible.title: Voucher for 1 Fuck

collectible.text: Panty's days and nights have more ghost hunting than she'd prefer, but she has a long list of people she wants to fuck (or fuck again), and you're on it. collectible.title: How to Fuck

collectible.text: This game so much stripping and masturbating and not nearly enough sex for Panty's liking. Maybe you all just don't know how to fuck? She ordered these illustrated books online and is handing one out to every person she sees at the Inventory. This is your copy.
